title: optical_filter
description: The "optical_filter" object describing a filter that was used to define illumination light properties used for BRDF measurement.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

model.title: model
model.description: Model of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

type.title: type
type.description: Type of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. For example, interference filter, neutral density filter, absorptive filter etc. as a text/string.

material.title: material
material.description: Material of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

cut_on_wl.title: cut_on_wl
cut_on_wl.description: A cut-on wavelength of optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the cut-on wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter cut-on wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

cut_off_wl.title: cut_off_wl
cut_off_wl.description: A cut-off wavelength of optical filter inserted into the path of the light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter cut-off wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter cut-off wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: The field describing transmission wavelength range of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "min_value", "max_value" and "unit".

min_value.title: value
min_value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission shortest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

max_value.title: value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission longest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's transmission shortest and longest wavelengths as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

central_wl.title: central_wl
central_wl.description: The central transmission wavelength of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter central wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter central wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

transmission_FWHM.title: transmission_FWHM
transmission_FWHM.description: Full Width at Half Maximum of the spectral transmission range of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission FWHM as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's transmission FWHM as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

transmission_avg.title: transmission_avg
transmission_avg.description: Average transmission value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's average transmission value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's average transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

min_transmission.title: min_transmission
min_transmission.description: Minimal transmission value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's minimal transmission value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's minimal transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

max_transmission.title: max_transmission
max_transmission.description: Maximal transmission value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's maximal transmission value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's maximal transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

blocking_avg.title: blocking_avg
blocking_avg.description: Average blocking/absorption value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's average blocking/absorption value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's average blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD".

min_blocking.title: min_blocking
min_blocking.description: Minimal blocking/absorption value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's minimal blocking/absorption value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's minimal blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD".

max_blocking.title: max_blocking
max_blocking.description: Maximal blocking/absorption value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's maximal blocking/absorption value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's maximal blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD".

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: Field describing maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An object that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding optical filter placed in in the path of light of illumination source used for BRDF measurements. Array of text/string URL links.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: An object that allows to provide any additional information regarding optical filter placed in in the path of light of illumination source used for BRDF measurements. Array of text/string URL links.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the optical filter placed in in the path of light of illumination source that cannot be presented within "filter" object properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries except new objects
